FuncDef: The pki certificate access-control-policy default command configures the default certificate access control policy. The pki certificate access-control-policy default command configures the default certificate access control policy. By default, the action in the policy is permit. That is, the certificate is allowed to pass verification.
CLIs: pki certificate access-control-policy default { permit | deny }

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that a certificate is allowed to pass verification.
-

Indicates that a certificate is not allowed to pass verification.
